company.name: MareDatum Consultoria e Gestão de Projectos Unipessoal LDA
company.project: BGAPP - Biodiversity and Geographic Analysis Platform for Angola

project_details.name: BGAPP Angola
project_details.description: Marine biodiversity monitoring platform for Angolan territorial waters
project_details.use_case: Real-time monitoring of fishing activities in Angolan territorial waters for biodiversity protection and sustainable fishing management

public-global-vessels:v3.0.name: Global Vessels Dataset
public-global-vessels:v3.0.description: Basic vessel information including position, type, and flag
public-global-vessels:v3.0.justification: Core vessel tracking for Angolan waters

public-global-vessel-identity:v3.0.name: Vessel Identity Dataset
public-global-vessel-identity:v3.0.description: Complete vessel identity with IMO, callsign, and registry data

public-global-fishing-effort:v3.0.name: Fishing Effort Dataset
public-global-fishing-effort:v3.0.description: Fishing activity and effort data per location
public-global-fishing-effort:v3.0.justification: Monitor fishing pressure in Angolan marine protected areas

public-global-carrier-vessels:v3.0.name: Carrier Vessels Dataset
public-global-carrier-vessels:v3.0.justification: Track support vessels and supply chains

public-global-transshipment:v3.0.name: Transshipment Dataset
public-global-transshipment:v3.0.justification: Detect illegal transshipment activities in Angolan waters

public-global-encounters:v3.0.name: Vessel Encounters Dataset
public-global-encounters:v3.0.description: Meetings and interactions between vessels at sea
public-global-encounters:v3.0.justification: Identify suspicious vessel meetings and potential IUU activities

public-global-loitering:v3.0.name: Loitering Events Dataset
public-global-loitering:v3.0.description: Vessels remaining stationary for extended periods
public-global-loitering:v3.0.justification: Detect potential unauthorized fishing or waiting activities

public-global-port-visits:v3.0.name: Port Visits Dataset
public-global-port-visits:v3.0.justification: Monitor traffic at Angolan ports (Luanda, Benguela, Lobito)

public-global-sar-detections:v3.0.name: SAR Detections Dataset
public-global-sar-detections:v3.0.justification: Detect dark vessels not broadcasting AIS in Angolan waters

public-global-viirs-detections:v3.0.name: VIIRS Night Fishing Dataset
public-global-viirs-detections:v3.0.description: Night fishing activity detected by satellite lights
public-global-viirs-detections:v3.0.justification: Monitor night fishing activities and potential IUU fishing

public-global-vessel-authorizations:v3.0.name: Vessel Authorizations Dataset
public-global-vessel-authorizations:v3.0.description: Fishing licenses and permits by jurisdiction
public-global-vessel-authorizations:v3.0.justification: Verify fishing vessel authorization status in Angolan waters

public-global-rfmo-authorizations:v3.0.name: RFMO Authorizations Dataset
public-global-rfmo-authorizations:v3.0.justification: Check ICCAT and other RFMO compliance for vessels in region

public-global-compliance-indicators:v3.0.name: Compliance Indicators Dataset
public-global-compliance-indicators:v3.0.description: Vessel compliance scores and risk indicators
public-global-compliance-indicators:v3.0.justification: Risk assessment for vessels operating in Angolan waters

access_request.fallback_plan: Use available public datasets with limited functionality

implementation_plan.phase_4: Update proxy worker with new dataset endpoints
